vlm_description.description: A beautiful sunset over mountains with a lake in the foreground. The sky is painted with vibrant oranges and purples, reflecting on the calm water surface. In the distance, silhouettes of pine trees frame the scene.
vlm_description.prompt: Create a detailed description of this image to help users find it with text search.

vlm_description.description: A beach scene with palm trees swaying in the breeze. The ocean is a clear turquoise blue, and the sand is pristine white. There are colorful beach umbrellas dotting the shoreline and a few people swimming in the distance.
vlm_description.prompt: Create a detailed description of this image to help users find it with text search.

vlm_description.description: A snowy winter scene in a forest. Tall pine trees are covered in fresh snow, and the forest floor is blanketed in white. Sunlight filters through the branches creating a magical atmosphere with shadows and light dancing on the snow.
vlm_description.prompt: Create a detailed description of this image to help users find it with text search.
